## Tractor Tender Notice

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-265-72026192
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-03-13
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-04 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-15
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-05-30
*   **Tender Status**: Expiré

### Contract Information

*   **Procurement Category**: *GD
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**:  *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) *North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: *Alberta
*   **Regions of Delivery**: *Lethbridge

### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: CFIA (Canadian Food Inspection Agency)
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   Name: Sarah Halpenny
    *   Email: [sarah.halpenny@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:sarah.halpenny@inspection.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (613) 795-7916

### Tender Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires a tractor, specifically a product classified under UNSPSC 21100000: **Agricultural and forestry and landscape machinery and equipment**. This tender process is only open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the RFSA E60HS-18AGTR/A. Suppliers must refer to the link provided if they wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this SA.

The requested delivery date for the tractor is 2024-05-30. Debriefings may be requested by bidders within 15 working days of receiving notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

Contact information can be found above.
